languages.text: "Вскоре мне тоже предстоит стать той, кто поведет за собой тысячи жизней великой навигаторской династии — новатором. И от последствий моего правления будут зависеть миллиарды человеческих жизней по всему Простору... быть может даже Империуму".

traits.locale_text: "Вскоре мне тоже предстоит стать той, кто поведет за собой тысячи жизней великой навигаторской династии — новатором. И от последствий моего правления будут зависеть миллиарды человеческих жизней по всему Простору... быть может даже Империуму".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Before long, I, too, shall become one who leads thousands of souls. The head of a great Navigator House. A Novator. The consequences of my rule will affect billions of human lives across the Koronus Expanse... perhaps even the Calixis Sector as well."
languages.original_text: "Вскоре мне тоже предстоит стать той, кто поведет за собой тысячи жизней великой навигаторской династии — новатором. И от последствий моего правления будут зависеть миллиарды человеческих жизней по всему Простору... быть может даже Империуму".

traits.locale_text: "Before long, I, too, will become one who leads thousands of souls. The head of a great Navigator House. A Novator. The consequences of my rule will affect billions of human lives across the Koronus Expanse... perhaps even the Imperium itself."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Before long, I, too, will become one who leads thousands of souls. The head of a great Navigator House. A Novator. The consequences of my rule will affect billions of human lives across the Koronus Expanse... perhaps even the Imperium itself."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Before long, I, too, shall become one who leads thousands of souls. The head of a great Navigator House. A Novator. The consequences of my rule will affect billions of human lives across the Koronus Expanse... perhaps even the Imperium itself."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Before long, I, too, shall become one who leads thousands of souls. The head of a great Navigator House. A Novator. The consequences of my rule will affect billions of human lives across the Koronus Expanse... perhaps even the Imperium itself."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Before long, I, too, shall become one who leads thousands of souls. The head of a great Navigator House. A Novator. The consequences of my rule will affect billions of human lives across the Koronus Expanse... perhaps even the Calixis Sector as well."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “不久之后，我也将成为万千族人的领袖，某个导航者家族的大族长。我的统治将会影响科罗努斯扩区的数十亿人口，甚至影响卡利西斯星区本身。”
languages.original_text: "Before long, I, too, shall become one who leads thousands of souls. The head of a great Navigator House. A Novator. The consequences of my rule will affect billions of human lives across the Koronus Expanse... perhaps even the Calixis Sector as well."

traits.locale_text: “不久之后，我也将成为万千族人的领袖，某个导航者家族的大族长。我的统治将会影响科罗努斯扩区的数十亿人口，甚至影响帝国本身。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Eines Tages werde auch ich tausende von Seelen anführen. Als Kopf eines großen Navigatorenhauses. Als Novator. Die Konsequenzen meiner Herrschaft werden sich auf Milliarden von Menschenleben in der gesamten Koronus-Ausdehnung auswirken ... vielleicht sogar auf den Calixis-Sektor."
languages.original_text: "Before long, I, too, shall become one who leads thousands of souls. The head of a great Navigator House. A Novator. The consequences of my rule will affect billions of human lives across the Koronus Expanse... perhaps even the Calixis Sector as well."

traits.locale_text: "Eines Tages werde auch ich tausende von Seelen anführen. Als Kopf eines großen Navigatorenhauses. Als Novator. Die Konsequenzen meiner Herrschaft werden sich auf Milliarden von Menschenleben in der gesamten Koronus-Ausdehnung auswirken ... vielleicht sogar auf das Imperium selbst."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Bientôt, je guiderai moi aussi des milliers d'âmes. À la tête d'une grande maison de navigateurs. Je serai une Novator. Les conséquences de mon règne affecteront des milliards de vies humaines à travers les Étendues de Koronus... voire dans le secteur Calixis. »
languages.original_text: "Before long, I, too, shall become one who leads thousands of souls. The head of a great Navigator House. A Novator. The consequences of my rule will affect billions of human lives across the Koronus Expanse... perhaps even the Calixis Sector as well."

traits.locale_text: « Bientôt, je guiderai moi aussi des milliers d'âmes. À la tête d'une grande maison de navigateurs. Je serai une Novator. Les conséquences de mon règne affecteront des milliards de vies humaines à travers les Étendues de Koronus... voire dans l'Imperium même. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Yo también me convertiré en alguien que guíe a miles de almas dentro de poco. Dirigiré toda una casa de navegantes. Seré la Novator. Las consecuencias de mi gobierno afectarán a miles de millones de vidas humanas en toda la Extensión de Koronus... Quizá incluso al sector Calixis entero».
languages.original_text: "Before long, I, too, shall become one who leads thousands of souls. The head of a great Navigator House. A Novator. The consequences of my rule will affect billions of human lives across the Koronus Expanse... perhaps even the Calixis Sector as well."

traits.locale_text: «Yo también me convertiré en alguien que guíe a miles de almas dentro de poco. Dirigiré toda una casa de navegantes. Seré la Novator. Las consecuencias de mi gobierno afectarán a miles de millones de vidas humanas en toda la Extensión de Koronus... Quizá incluso al sector Calixis entero».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「まもなくあたくしも、何千何万の魂を導く者になります。偉大なる航宙士の家の長です。ノベイターです。あたくしの決めることは、結果としてコロヌス・エクスパンス全体の何十億もの人間の命に影響を与えるでしょう…もしかしたら、キャリクシス星域そのものにまで影響します」
languages.original_text: "Before long, I, too, shall become one who leads thousands of souls. The head of a great Navigator House. A Novator. The consequences of my rule will affect billions of human lives across the Koronus Expanse... perhaps even the Calixis Sector as well."

traits.locale_text: 「まもなくあたくしも、何千何万の魂を導く者になります。偉大なる航宙士の家の長です。ノベイターです。あたくしの決めることは、結果としてコロヌス・エクスパンス全体の何十億もの人間の命に影響を与えるでしょう…もしかしたら、キャリクシス星域そのものにまで影響します」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Before long, I, too, shall become one who leads thousands of souls. The head of a great Navigator House. A Novator. The consequences of my rule will affect billions of human lives across the Koronus Expanse... perhaps even the Calixis Sector as well."

languages.text: "Çok yakında ben de... Binlerce ruha önderlik ediyor olacağım. Büyük bir Rotacı Hanesi'nin önderi, Rota Reisi olacağım. Vereceğim hükümler, Koronus Enginliği'ndeki milyarlarca insanın hayatına etki edecek. Hatta belki Calixis Sektörü'ndekilerin bile."
languages.original_text: "Before long, I, too, shall become one who leads thousands of souls. The head of a great Navigator House. A Novator. The consequences of my rule will affect billions of human lives across the Koronus Expanse... perhaps even the Calixis Sector as well."
